CHAT.comment: Saturday night at home on Spencer Street , poor quality sound
tape 17.3a; using .aif file; there is no .wav file

u.a: voiceless; 3.7 sec: D rapidly switches light on and off
fast and overlaps with crawling 1.3 sec
1.6 sec silence , then they speak together
protest as D wipes sore places; 3 sec
fast; 'walk feet' is a term D made up , used when he encourages S to walk
fast; 5 sec: silence , then S starts to fuss and kick
15 sec , noisy , high squeal , clunks , evidently they are playing with Seth's Busy Box
22 sec: silence , sigh , buzz , S coughs , fusses a little
7.5 sec , silence , far away bang , whisper
accompanied by clicking of switch; 0.8 sec
switching on and off; 7 sec clicks and a buzz
13 sec silence , a few effort sounds
loud shout; 40 sec silence , fuss , cough , effort , fuss , shout
note that this sounds like a combination: 'door tikatika'
overlap with the loud noise; pause
12.5 sec unwrapping noises , then a slam
6.4 sec: silence , then S fusses , more silence
fast; 1.5 sec , liquid pouring; S hoots and whines for 7 sec , 9:14-21 , then D starts imitates him at 9:21; 1 sec silence
'thirsty'; clearly; 3.3 sec silence , then S starts to fuss for 3s
S starts crawling as D speaks
82 sec: S drinks , coughs , car passes , clicking sounds
protest; 2.5 sec silence and one more small sound from S
5 sec: clatter of D in kitchen
0.6 sec: S coughs , D clears his throat
sotto voce; 3.5 sec: D growling , S giggling
72 sec: clatters , breathing , burp , car passes; faint voices , effort sounds , S sneezes , rustles , sniff
a dish clatters at the same time; 3.8 sec
puzzled; 15.4 sec: silence , single knocking sound in the middle
note: no combination this time; 0.9 sec
S makes a small sound while D is speaking; 1.2 sec silence
2.6 sec silence , then S starts to fuss
S squeals in protest , starts to cry
overlap with S starting to cry
patting S; 1.8 sec , S makes one fuss sound
1.6 sec: silence , rustles , S makes one sound
4 sec , S starts with a high pitched fuss; D overlaps , imitating him
imitates S; overlap with S whining
15 sec: D blows a pitch pipe; S laughs; D continues to blow , getting fancier
18.5 sec silence , D blows twice , S laughs , more silence
very fast; then S and D speak together
16 sec: silence , someone blows twice , D sniffs , D blows pipe at 18:32 , silence , S makes a couple of sounds
3.4 sec: clatter; S does 2 air-blows; D sniffs
6.7 sec: silence , then S fusses twice
what he says when he throws something; 1.5 sec clatter
11 sec: clatter of S throwing keys; silence; traffic
15.5 sec , silence , moving around , rattle of plastic keys
9.7 sec more silence , rattling , siren outside
52 sec: cracks , rattles , sniff , more rattles , then D starts to sing
at 21:11 D starts playing his guitar , not always smoothly for over a minute; overlapped by S several times
whispering , short silence , then S fusses , starts to stomp
D plays his guitar again , loud strumming; 3 sec , D sniffs , silence
S blows twice , asking for the pipe
3.4 sec , soft noises , then something drops
3.9 sec: silence , then S does a double blow , echoed by D
3.6 sec , silence with clunk in the middle
sounds of heavy things dropping; 2.3 sec
sounds like 'I want get down'; 1.5 sec; may be asking to get up
S and D overlap; D bouncing S on the bed
softly , lightly strums strings as he speaks; 4 sec , dog barking outside
softly strumming strings; 1.9 sec , dog barking
8 sec; guitar strings , then soft pounding on the guitar; then they speak together
soft and hard to understand; 6 sec , outside voices , one or 2 notes
means a slack-key tuning: soft; voices calling outside
voiceless , starts tuning guitar; 9.5 sec no talk
overlap with D tuning guitar which segues into D working on a slack-key tune until S shouts at 27:17
may be asking to rock; 5.5 sec: guitar and traffic
voiceless; S is making small sounds
2.3 sec , D starts fiddling with his guitar again
5 sec , S crawls around , makes a couple fussy sounds
bouncing continues for 2 sec until tape ends at 30:56
